verses.verse: A Psalm of David. I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%>: Unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, will I sing <S%H2167>praises<s%>.

I will behave myself <S%H7919>wisely<s%> in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>: Oh when wilt thou <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H1980>me<s%>? I will walk <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H8537>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> no <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> before mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6213>work<s%> of them that turn <S%H7750>aside<s%>; It shall not cleave unto <S%H1692>me<s%>.
A <S%H6141>perverse<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3045>me<s%>: I will know no evil <S%H7451>thing<s%>.

Whoso <S%H5643>privily<s%> <S%H3960>slandereth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, him will I <S%H6789>destroy<s%>: Him that hath a <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%> and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> will I not <S%H3201>suffer<s%>.

Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be upon the <S%H539>faithful<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H1980>me<s%>: He that walketh in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, he shall minister unto <S%H8334>me<s%>.

He that <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H7423>deceit<s%> shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>: He that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> shall not be <S%H3559>established<s%> before mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning will I <S%H6789>destroy<s%> all the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; To cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
